  <title>TCHAD: Admin Level 1 Boundaries</title>
  <abstract>The dataset represents the regions of Tchad. 
This is an operational dataset for humanitarian response. The boundaries are not yet recognized officially by the government but knowledgeable, local technical stakeholder participated to the development of these layers.


Administrative level 1 (Regions) of Tchad</abstract>

  <history>Layer was downloaded as a shapefile by ITOS from an email from the IMO. It was then analyzed by ITOS for errors. The layer was sent back to UNOCHA as a feature class within a file geodatabase.</history>
